title: Louis Garneau, Kids Calory Padded, Breathable, Shock Absorbing, Half Finger Bike Gloves
features: Enhance your ride: Features foam padding to soften vibration for reduced hand fatigue during long rides.
Breathable: The perforated palm with Ergo Air ventilation keeps your hands cool.
Comfortable: The leather-like material is soft and comfortable to wear.
Simple: Features proprietary finger pullers for easy removal.
Practical: Silicone puller at the wrist allows for quick and easy removal.
description: The Kids Calory Jr Cycling Glove features a perforated palm with Ergo Air ventilation to keep your hands cool. The leatherlike material is soft and comfortable to wear and the foam padding softens vibration for less hand fatigue during long rides. Features finger pullers and silicone puller at wrist for easy removal.
